title.rendered: Bashundhara R/A: The new upstate of Dhaka

content.rendered:
Dhaka city, a city of dreams, the capital city of Bangladesh is one of the most densely populated cities in the world and ipso facto in Bangladesh. Thus available living spaces are in short supply and high demand. With increasing citizenry and their wish to live in Dhaka city, property developers are focusing on building high quality housings in gated communities to meet the demand with a sense of security and mark of prestige. And mention of gated communities is incomplete without mentioning Bashundhara Residential Area. A summary of Bashundhara R/A is it being the most in demand land space in Dhaka and all over Bangladesh.

Offering a wide host of amenities, comforts and zonal improvements over other areas, everyone wants a piece of this land. Every major property developer vies to produce their masterpiece property in this area as their prestigious signature.

Edison Real Estate, as part of their signature prestigious offerings holds, not one or two in fact several magnificent and extraordinary property housings in this area.

Ranging from deluxe to luxurious to right out remarkable projects that are awe inspiring and highly sought after among citizens. There are a total of thirteen projects in total that belong to the Edison Real Estate Portfolio currently.

The lineup of these properties are Edison’s Angelo, Prospero, Titania, Apricus, Amour, Rosalind, Ophelia, Othello, South Serenade, Adelia, Castalia, Irida and Lavender.

The lineup of projects will only grow in the future and Edison Real Estate will continue to offer to its buyers the best and most prestigious housings possible.
